alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:38PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sullivan, Hawkins, Washington, northeastern Hancock, southeastern Jefferson, Cocke, Greene, northeastern Sevier, Unicoi, west central Carter, southeastern Hamblen and southern Scott Counties through 430 PM EST... At 337 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Surgoinsville to near White Pine to 7 miles east of Sevierville. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Morristown, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Greeneville, Sevierville, Elizabethton, Newport and Erwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
